title: Weight modules for quantum symmetric pair subalgebras
summary: We develop a theory of weights for a quantum analogue of the symmetric pair (gl4,gl2 x gl2) realised as a quantum symmetric pair subalgebra. Based on Letzter's triangular decomposition we define Verma modules. Using magical operators that are compatible with weight spaces, we classify weight Verma modules and characterise their irreducible finite dimensional quotients. We then prove the existence of weight bases in tensor products by explicitly constructing some highest weight vectors. These constructions allow us to mimic the important aspects of the classical finite dimensional representation theory. Applications include a definition of rational representations, the BGG resolution, a Clebsch--Gordan formula, the Harish-Chandra isomorphism and central characters, as well as a classification and description of all irreducible polynomial representations.

AI.tldr: 该论文建立了量子对称对(gl4,gl2 x gl2)的权重理论，定义了Verma模，分类了权重Verma模并刻画了其有限维不可约商模，构造了张量积中的权重基，并推导了经典有限维表示论的重要结果。
AI.motivation: 研究量子对称对(gl4,gl2 x gl2)的表示理论，建立量子对称对子代数的权重理论，以模仿经典有限维表示论的重要方面。
AI.method: 基于Letzter的三角分解定义Verma模；使用与权重空间兼容的"魔术算子"分类权重Verma模；通过显式构造最高权向量证明张量积中权重基的存在性。
AI.result: 分类了权重Verma模并刻画了其有限维不可约商模；构造了张量积中的权重基；建立了有理表示、BGG分解、Clebsch-Gordan公式、Harish-Chandra同构和中心特征等理论；分类并描述了所有不可约多项式表示。
AI.conclusion: 成功建立了量子对称对(gl4,gl2 x gl2)的完整表示理论框架，实现了对经典有限维表示论重要方面的量子模拟，为量子对称对的表示理论研究提供了系统方法。

title: Birational Weyl Group Action on the Symplectic Groupoid and Cluster Algebras
summary:
A. Bondal introduced a symplectic groupoid of triangular bilinear forms. This induces the Poisson structure on $\mathcal{A}_n$, the space of $n \times n$ unipotent upper-triangular matrices. L. Chekhov and M. Shapiro described log-canonical coordinates on this symplectic groupoid via the $\mathcal{A}_n$-quiver. In this paper, we introduce a birational Weyl group action on the symplectic groupoid. It is generated by cluster transformations associated with certain cycles of the quiver. We prove that every matrix entry of $\mathcal{A}_n$ is invariant under this action. Conversely, we prove that matrix entries generate the Poisson subalgebra of Weyl group invariants in the ring of regular functions on the cluster variety $\mathcal X_{|\mathcal A_n|}$.
  V. Fock and L. Chekhov defined a Poisson map $φ_n$ from the Teichmüller space $\mathcal{T}_{g,s}$ with genus $g$ and $s \in \{1,2\}$ boundary components into $\mathcal{A}_n$. We aim to describe the cluster structure of $\text{Im}(φ_n)$ by applying a Hamiltonian reduction to $\mathcal A_n$. Since every element in $\text{Im}(φ_n)$ satisfies the rank condition $\text{rank}(A+A^T) \le 4$, it provides a natural criterion for our Hamiltonian reduction. The solution set of the rank condition has distinct irreducible components, so the reduction might be component-dependent. However, we show that the Weyl group acts transitively on these components. This implies that the Hamiltonian reductions are conjugate; thus, it suffices to determine the reduction on a single component.
  Furthermore, we prove that the longest element of the Weyl group corresponds to a cluster DT-transformation on the $\mathcal{A}_{2k}$-quiver. In contrast, we show that no reddening sequence exists for odd $n$.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了三角双线性形式的辛群胚上的Weyl群作用，证明了矩阵元素在该作用下的不变性，并探讨了Teichmüller空间到$\mathcal{A}_n$的Poisson映射的像的簇结构，通过哈密顿约化描述其簇结构。
AI.motivation: 研究三角双线性形式的辛群胚上的Weyl群作用，探索Teichmüller空间到$\mathcal{A}_n$的Poisson映射的像的簇结构，通过哈密顿约化来描述这一结构。
AI.method: 引入辛群胚上的双有理Weyl群作用，该作用由与quiver中特定循环相关的簇变换生成。应用哈密顿约化到$\mathcal{A}_n$来描述$\text{Im}(φ_n)$的簇结构，利用秩条件$\text{rank}(A+A^T) \le 4$作为约化准则。
AI.result: 证明了$\mathcal{A}_n$的每个矩阵元素在Weyl群作用下不变；Weyl群在秩条件的不可约分支上传递作用；对于偶数$n=2k$，Weyl群的最长元素对应簇DT变换，而对于奇数$n$不存在红化序列。
AI.conclusion: 辛群胚上的Weyl群作用具有重要的不变性质，哈密顿约化可以有效地描述Teichmüller空间映射像的簇结构，且约化结果在Weyl群作用下具有一致性。

title: Brownian motion on reflection quantum groups. Construction and cutoff
summary: T. In this study, we construct an analog of the Brownian motion on free reflection quantum groups and compute its cutoff profile.

AI.tldr: 该研究在自由反射量子群上构建了布朗运动的类似物，并计算了其截止剖面
AI.motivation: 研究自由反射量子群上的随机过程，将经典布朗运动的概念推广到量子群框架中，探索量子群上的概率论和随机分析
AI.method: 在自由反射量子群上构造布朗运动的类似物，采用量子概率和算子代数方法，计算该过程的截止剖面
AI.result: 成功构建了自由反射量子群上的布朗运动类似物，并精确计算了其截止剖面，为量子群上的随机过程理论提供了新的结果
AI.conclusion: 该研究将经典布朗运动推广到自由反射量子群框架，建立了量子群上的随机过程理论，为量子概率论的发展做出了贡献

title: On Higher Representation Theory via Categories of type Charge-Conserving--with--Glue
summary: In this paper we introduce a strict monoidal subcategory of the category of matrices, suitable to address a higher representation theoretic analogue of radicals (non-semisimplicity) in ordinary representation theory. We show the extent to which this analogue has analogous representation theoretic properties. To illustrate, we apply to two key problems in the study of braid representations (strict monoidal functors from the braid category $\mathsf{B}$ to the matrix category): the classification problem; and the problem of analysing the ordinary braid group representations that braid representations generate in towers.

AI.tldr: 本文引入矩阵范畴的一个严格幺半子范畴，用于处理高阶表示论中类似普通表示论中根（非半单性）的概念，并展示该类比在表示论性质上的相似程度，最后应用于辫子表示的两个关键问题。
AI.motivation: 在普通表示论中，根（非半单性）是重要概念，但高阶表示论中缺乏类似工具。本文旨在构建矩阵范畴的严格幺半子范畴，为高阶表示论提供处理非半单性的类比工具。
AI.method: 引入矩阵范畴的一个严格幺半子范畴，研究其表示论性质与普通表示论中根概念的类比关系。将该框架应用于辫子表示的两个关键问题：分类问题和分析辫子表示在塔中生成的普通辫子群表示。
AI.result: 建立了矩阵范畴的严格幺半子范畴，展示了该范畴在高阶表示论中与普通表示论中根概念的类比性质。将该框架成功应用于辫子表示的分类问题和塔表示分析。
AI.conclusion: 本文构建的严格幺半子范畴为高阶表示论提供了处理非半单性的有效工具，成功应用于辫子表示的关键问题，展示了该框架在表示论研究中的实用价值。

title: Double-bosonization and Majid's conjecture (V): grafting of quantum groups
summary: The goal of this paper is to propose and carry out a program which allows us to yield a larger target quantum group of Drinfeld-Jimbo type via grafting two given smaller ones. To this effect, we first set up some basics of a multi-tensor product theory of the generalized double-bosonization construction (see [HH2] for the latter). Such a grafting method, depending on the choice of grafting node in the Dynkin diagram, including rank-induction and type-crossing constructions as special cases, provides a one-stop resolving strategy of the generation question of Majid's quantum tree, which grows up from the root part $U_q(\mathfrak{sl}_2)$ and decorates with the quantum groups of various Dynkin diagrams (of finite types) as the branches.

AI.tldr: 提出一种通过嫁接两个较小量子群来生成更大目标量子群的程序，基于广义双玻色化构造的多张量积理论
AI.motivation: 解决Majid量子树的生成问题，该量子树从Uq(sl2)作为根开始生长，并以各种有限型Dynkin图的量子群作为分支
AI.method: 建立广义双玻色化构造的多张量积理论基础，提出基于Dynkin图中嫁接节点选择的嫁接方法，包括秩归纳和类型交叉构造作为特例
AI.result: 提供了一站式解决策略，能够生成更大目标量子群，特别是Drinfeld-Jimbo型量子群
AI.conclusion: 嫁接方法为量子群的系统构造提供了有效框架，特别适用于Majid量子树的生成问题

title: Skeins, $q$-series, and modularity
summary: We study BPS $q$-series associated to 3-manifolds decorated by a line defect along an embedded link. We prove that these $q$-series depend only on the class of the link in the skein module, thereby defining a homomorphism from the skein module to the space of $q$-series. The image of this homomorphism is conjectured to be holomorphically quantum modular, which suggests a new approach to Langlands duality for skein modules through $q$-series.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究3-流形上沿嵌入链结的线缺陷相关的BPS q-级数，证明这些q-级数仅依赖于链结在skein模中的等价类，从而定义了从skein模到q-级数空间的同态映射。
AI.motivation: 研究3-流形上线缺陷的BPS q-级数，探索它们与skein模的关系，为通过q-级数方法研究skein模的Langlands对偶性提供新途径。
AI.method: 通过证明BPS q-级数仅依赖于链结在skein模中的等价类，构造从skein模到q-级数空间的同态映射，并基于此提出量子模性猜想。
AI.result: 成功证明了BPS q-级数只依赖于链结在skein模中的类，建立了从skein模到q-级数空间的同态，并提出了该同态像具有全纯量子模性的猜想。
AI.conclusion: 该工作为通过q-级数研究skein模的Langlands对偶性开辟了新方向，将拓扑不变量与量子模形式联系起来，提供了研究3-流形拓扑的新工具。

title: Shifted symplectic structures and Poisson vertex algebra
summary: We construct Poisson vertex algebra (PVA) structures on arc spaces from $1$-shifted symplectic (QP) data. A Hamiltonian satisfying the classical master equation induces a canonical PVA $λ$-bracket, matching the Hamiltonian-operator formalism for integrable hierarchies. As applications, we find the resulting PVA sheaves on $\mathbb P^1$ and reinterpret our classical $R$-matrix as Maurer-Cartan data in a deformation-theoretic geometric framework, yielding AKS-type integrable hierarchies from the corresponding $R$-deformations.

AI.tldr: 该论文从1-移位辛(QP)数据构造弧空间上的泊松顶点代数(PVA)结构，哈密顿量满足经典主方程诱导规范PVA λ-括号，匹配可积系统的哈密顿算子形式，应用于P^1上的PVA层，将经典R-矩阵重新解释为形变理论几何框架中的Maurer-Cartan数据，从相应R-形变得到AKS型可积系统。
AI.motivation: 研究如何从几何数据（1-移位辛结构）构造代数结构（泊松顶点代数），建立可积系统理论中哈密顿算子形式与几何框架之间的联系，为可积系统提供新的几何解释和构造方法。
AI.method: 从1-移位辛(QP)数据出发，在弧空间上构造泊松顶点代数结构；利用满足经典主方程的哈密顿量诱导规范的PVA λ-括号；将经典R-矩阵重新解释为形变理论几何框架中的Maurer-Cartan数据；通过R-形变得到AKS型可积系统。
AI.result: 成功建立了从几何数据到代数结构的对应关系；得到了P^1上的PVA层结构；实现了经典R-矩阵在形变理论框架下的几何解释；构造了AKS型可积系统，为可积系统理论提供了新的几何视角。
AI.conclusion: 该工作将1-移位辛几何与泊松顶点代数理论相结合，为可积系统提供了统一的几何-代数框架，建立了哈密顿算子形式与几何形变理论之间的联系，扩展了可积系统的构造和理解方法。

title: Differential calculus on Hopf-Galois extension via the Durdevic braiding
summary: We introduce a class of first-order differential calculus on principal comodule algebras generated by the Durdevic braiding $σ$ and a chosen vertical ideal. Starting from the universal calculus and a strong connection, we construct $σ$-generated calculus and prove their existence for arbitrary principal comodule algebras. We show that, in this setting, connection $1$-forms and vertical maps descend to the quotient calculus and are compatible with the induced braided symmetry. We also compare this framework with Durdevic's complete differential calculus.

AI.tldr: 本文介绍了一种基于Durdevic辫子σ和垂直理想生成的主余模代数上的一阶微分演算，证明了这类演算对于任意主余模代数的存在性，并研究了其与完全微分演算的关系。
AI.motivation: 研究主余模代数上的微分几何结构，特别是基于辫子结构的微分演算构造，为非交换几何中的纤维丛理论提供新的数学工具。
AI.method: 从通用微分演算和强连接出发，构造σ生成的微分演算，证明其对任意主余模代数的存在性，并研究连接1-形式和垂直映射在商演算中的下降性质。
AI.result: 证明了σ生成的微分演算对任意主余模代数都存在，连接1-形式和垂直映射可以下降到商演算并保持辫子对称性，建立了与Durdevic完全微分演算的对比框架。
AI.conclusion: 成功构建了基于Durdevic辫子结构的主余模代数微分演算理论，为研究非交换几何中的纤维丛结构提供了新的数学工具和理论框架。

title: Affinization of dendriform $\md$-bialgebras, Lie bialgebras and solutions of classical Yang-Baxter equation
summary: In this paper, we mainly discuss how to use dendriform $\md$-bialgebras to construct Lie bialgebras and the relationship between the solutions of their corresponding Yang-Baxter equations. We provide two methods for obtaining Lie algebras from dendriform algebras using the tensor product with perm algebras, one by means of associative algebras and the other by means of pre-Lie algebras. We elevate both approaches to the level of bialgebras and prove that the Lie bialgebraa obtained using these two approaches are the same. There is a correspondence between symmetric solutions of the dendriform Yang-Baxter equation in dendriform algebras and certain skew-symmetric solutions of the classical Yang-Baxter equation in the Lie algebras induced from the dendriform algebras. The connections between triangular bialgebra structures, $\mathcal{O}$-operators related to the solutions of these Yang-Baxter equations are discussed in detail. During the discussion, we also present a method for constructing infinite-dimensional antisymmetric infinitesimal bialgebra by using the affineization of dendriform $\md$-bialgebras.

AI.tldr: 该论文主要研究如何利用dendriform $\md$-双代数构造李双代数，并探讨它们对应Yang-Baxter方程解之间的关系。提供了两种通过张量积从dendriform代数获得李代数的方法，并将这两种方法提升到双代数层面，证明得到的是相同的李双代数。
AI.motivation: 研究dendriform $\md$-双代数与李双代数之间的构造关系，探索不同代数结构之间的对应关系，特别是它们对应的Yang-Baxter方程解之间的转换机制。
AI.method:
1. 提供两种从dendriform代数获得李代数的方法：一种通过结合代数，另一种通过预李代数，都使用与perm代数的张量积
2. 将这两种方法提升到双代数层面
3. 证明这两种方法得到的李双代数是相同的
4. 建立dendriform Yang-Baxter方程的对称解与诱导李代数中经典Yang-Baxter方程的斜对称解之间的对应关系
5. 详细讨论三角双代数结构、$\mathcal{O}$-算子与这些Yang-Baxter方程解之间的关系
6. 提出通过dendriform $\md$-双代数的仿射化构造无限维反对称无穷小双代数的方法
AI.result:
1. 证明了两种构造方法得到的李双代数是相同的
2. 建立了dendriform Yang-Baxter方程的对称解与诱导李代数中经典Yang-Baxter方程的斜对称解之间的对应关系
3. 阐明了三角双代数结构、$\mathcal{O}$-算子与Yang-Baxter方程解之间的详细关系
4. 提出了构造无限维反对称无穷小双代数的新方法
AI.conclusion: 该论文系统地建立了dendriform $\md$-双代数与李双代数之间的构造关系，揭示了不同代数结构之间Yang-Baxter方程解的对应关系，并为构造无限维反对称无穷小双代数提供了新方法，深化了对代数结构之间相互联系的理解。

title: Nested ansatz method for Baker-Akhiezer functions
summary: We explain that the logic behind the derivation of the Noumi-Shiraishi function can be applied directly to the Baker-Akhiezer function (BAF). This amounts to changing an ansatz for BAF to a nested one, where the BAF of N + 1 variables is recursively expressed as a sum over BAFs of N variables. This may be seen as a generalization of symmetrization trick from [1], but for the generally non-symmetric BAF. We demonstrate that, for usual non-twisted (a = 1) BAFs, this method correctly reproduces the Noumi-Shiraishi formula directly from linear equations, resolving the ambiguity related to non-simple roots. For the first non-trivial twisted case (N = 3, a = 2) this method also fixes this ambiguity, moreover, answers for the first few layers of coefficients are in the form of direct quantization of [1].

AI.tldr: 该论文将Noumi-Shiraishi函数的推导逻辑直接应用于Baker-Akhiezer函数(BAF)，通过将BAF的假设改为嵌套形式，将N+1变量的BAF递归表示为N变量BAF的和，从而解决了非简单根相关的模糊性问题。
AI.motivation: 将Noumi-Shiraishi函数的推导方法应用于Baker-Akhiezer函数，解决BAF推导中的模糊性问题，特别是与非简单根相关的问题。
AI.method: 将BAF的假设改为嵌套形式，使N+1变量的BAF能够递归表示为N变量BAF的和。这种方法可以看作是对[1]中对称化技巧的推广，但适用于一般非对称的BAF。
AI.result: 对于通常的非扭曲(a=1)BAF，该方法直接从线性方程正确再现了Noumi-Shiraishi公式，解决了非简单根相关的模糊性。对于第一个非平凡扭曲情况(N=3, a=2)，该方法也解决了模糊性，并且前几层系数的答案形式是[1]的直接量子化。
AI.conclusion: 将Noumi-Shiraishi函数的推导逻辑应用于BAF是有效的，通过嵌套假设方法能够解决BAF推导中的模糊性问题，并为扭曲情况提供了明确的答案形式。

title: Ecalle's dimorphic transportation and Brown's lifting
summary: Brown's lifting procedure shows that one can solve the double shuffle equations modulo products from solutions of linearized ones. In this paper, we reveal that it is described in the framework of Ecalle's dimorphic transportation.

AI.tldr: 本文揭示了Brown的提升程序与Ecalle的二态运输框架之间的联系
AI.motivation: Brown的提升程序可以从线性化解求解双洗牌方程模积，但需要更深入的理论框架来解释这一现象
AI.method: 通过Ecalle的二态运输理论框架来描述Brown的提升程序
AI.result: 证明了Brown的提升程序可以在Ecalle的二态运输框架中得到描述和解释
AI.conclusion: Brown的提升程序与Ecalle的二态运输理论之间存在深刻的联系，这为理解双洗牌方程提供了新的理论视角

title: Partial Resolutions and Noncrossing Combinatorics
summary: For any finite reductive group, we compute the central elements in its Hecke algebra that arise from partial Springer resolutions via the Harish-Chandra transform. Of the two kinds of partial resolution, the larger is the more interesting case. We deduce formulas for associated Hecke traces, generalizing work of Wan-Wang beyond type $A$, and Deodhar-like decompositions of braid varieties that map to partial Springer resolutions. From the latter, we construct noncrossing sets that interpolate between rational Catalan and parking objects, generalizing our work with Galashin-Lam. In parallel, we establish new formulas for arbitrary $a$-degrees of the HOMFLYPT invariants of positive braid closures, from which we construct noncrossing sets for rational Kirkman numbers.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了有限约化群Hecke代数中的中心元素，这些元素通过Harish-Chandra变换从部分Springer分解中产生。论文推导了相关的Hecke迹公式，推广了Wan-Wang在A型之外的工作，并构建了有理Catalan和停车对象之间的非交叉集合。
AI.motivation: 研究有限约化群Hecke代数中来自部分Springer分解的中心元素，理解这些元素的结构和性质，并推广相关领域的工作。
AI.method: 通过Harish-Chandra变换从部分Springer分解计算Hecke代数的中心元素；推导Hecke迹公式；构建Deodhar类分解；构造有理Catalan和停车对象之间的非交叉集合；建立正辫闭合的HOMFLYPT不变量a-度公式。
AI.result: 计算了有限约化群Hecke代数中来自部分Springer分解的中心元素；推广了Wan-Wang在A型之外的工作；构建了有理Catalan和停车对象之间的非交叉集合；建立了正辫闭合HOMFLYPT不变量a-度的新公式。
AI.conclusion: 论文成功建立了部分Springer分解与Hecke代数中心元素之间的联系，推广了多个领域的工作，并为有理Catalan对象和有理Kirkman数构造了非交叉集合。

title: The properad of quadratic Poisson structures is Koszul
comment: Comments are welcome, v2: minor corrections
summary:
In this paper, we suggest a sufficient condition on the properadic envelope of a quadratic dioperad to be Koszul in terms of twisted associative algebras.
  As a particular new example, we show that the properad of quadratic Poisson structures is Koszul.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了二次dioperad的properadic包络为Koszul的充分条件，并以此证明二次Poisson结构的properad是Koszul的
AI.motivation: 研究二次dioperad的properadic包络的Koszul性质，为判断properad的Koszul性提供理论工具
AI.method: 通过扭曲结合代数的方法，建立二次dioperad的properadic包络为Koszul的充分条件
AI.result: 证明了二次Poisson结构的properad是Koszul的，这是一个新的重要例子
AI.conclusion: 提出的充分条件为判断properad的Koszul性提供了有效方法，并成功应用于Poisson结构的研究

title: Quantum Entanglement as a Cohomological Obstruction
summary: We recast quantum entanglement as a cohomological obstruction to reconstructing a global quantum state from locally compatible information. We address this by considering presheaf cohomologies of states and entanglement witnesses. Sheafification erases the global-from-local signature while leaving within-patch multipartite structure, captured by local entanglement groups introduced here. For smooth parameter families, the obstruction admits a differential-geometric representative obtained by pairing an appropriate witness field with the curvature of a natural unitary connection on the associated bundle of amplitudes. We also introduce a Quantum Entanglement Index (QEI) as an index-theoretic invariant of entangled states and explain its behavior. Finally, we outline a theoretical physics approach to probe these ideas in quantum many-body systems and suggest a possible entanglement-induced correction as an experimental validation. Detailed numerical implementations for concrete quantum many-body models are presented in the companion paper \cite{2026arXiv260113467I}.

AI.tldr: 将量子纠缠重新表述为从局部兼容信息重构全局量子态的层上同调障碍，引入局部纠缠群和量子纠缠指数，并提出实验验证方法。
AI.motivation: 传统量子纠缠描述缺乏几何和拓扑视角，本文旨在通过层上同调理论为量子纠缠提供新的数学框架，揭示其全局-局部重构障碍的本质。
AI.method: 使用预层上同调分析量子态和纠缠见证；引入局部纠缠群捕捉层化后的多体结构；对于光滑参数族，通过见证场与振幅丛上自然酉联络曲率的配对获得微分几何表示；定义量子纠缠指数作为纠缠态的指标理论不变量。
AI.result: 建立了量子纠缠的层上同调理论框架，证明了纠缠作为全局-局部重构障碍的数学性质，提出了可计算的量子纠缠指数，并为量子多体系统的实验验证提供了理论方案。
AI.conclusion: 量子纠缠本质上是全局量子态从局部信息重构的层上同调障碍，这一新视角为理解纠缠提供了更丰富的数学结构，并可能带来新的实验探测方法。

title: Constructing solutions of simplex equations from polygon equations
comment: 24 pages, 8 figures. Corrected typos, clarified Section 2
summary: We study polygon equations and their connections to simplex equations, which generalize the pentagon and Yang--Baxter equations, respectively. First, we show that certain "commutative" pairs of solutions of (dual) polygon equations give rise to solutions of higher-order polygon equations. Next, we define an explicit compatibility condition between solutions of the $n$-gon and dual $n$-gon equations and use it to construct solutions of the $(n-2)$- and $(n-1)$-simplex equations. This extends earlier work by Kashaev--Sergeev and Dimakis--Müller-Hoissen.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究多边形方程及其与单纯形方程的联系，多边形方程推广了五边形方程，单纯形方程推广了杨-巴克斯特方程。论文展示了某些"可交换"的多边形方程解对可以产生高阶多边形方程的解，并定义了n边形方程与对偶n边形方程解之间的显式兼容条件，用于构造(n-2)和(n-1)单纯形方程的解。
AI.motivation: 多边形方程和单纯形方程是数学物理中的重要方程，分别推广了五边形方程和杨-巴克斯特方程。研究这些方程之间的联系以及如何从一个方程的解构造另一个方程的解，有助于深入理解这些代数结构的本质和相互关系。
AI.method: 1. 研究"可交换"的多边形方程解对，证明它们可以产生高阶多边形方程的解。2. 定义n边形方程与对偶n边形方程解之间的显式兼容条件。3. 利用这种兼容条件构造(n-2)和(n-1)单纯形方程的解。
AI.result: 1. 建立了从可交换的多边形方程解对到高阶多边形方程解的构造方法。2. 提出了n边形方程与对偶n边形方程解之间的兼容条件。3. 证明了如何利用这种兼容条件构造低阶单纯形方程的解，扩展了Kashaev-Sergeev和Dimakis-Müller-Hoissen的早期工作。
AI.conclusion: 该研究深化了对多边形方程和单纯形方程之间关系的理解，提供了一种系统的方法从一个方程的解构造另一个方程的解，为这些代数结构的研究提供了新的工具和视角。

title: Operator lift of Reshetikhin-Turaev formalism to Khovanov-Rozansky TQFTs
summary: Topological quantum field theory (TQFT) is a powerful tool to describe homologies, which normally involve complexes and a variety of maps/morphisms, what makes a functional integration approach with a sum over a single kind of maps seemingly problematic. In TQFT this problem is overcame by exploiting the rich set of zero modes of BRST operators, which appear sufficient to describe complexes. We explain what this approach looks like for the important class of Khovanov-Rozansky (KR) cohomologies, which categorify the observables (Wilson lines or knot polynomials) in 3d Chern-Simons theory. We develop a construction of odd differential operators, associated with all link diagrams, including tangles with open ends. These operators become nilpotent only for diagram with no external legs, but even for open tangles one can develop a factorization formalism, which preserve Reidemeister/topological invariance -- the symmetry of the problem. This technique seems much more ``physical'' than conventional language of homological algebra and should have many applications to various problems beyond Chern-Simons theory. We also hope that this language will provide efficient algorithms, and finally allow to computerize the calculation of KR cohomologies -- for closed diagrams and for open tangles.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一种基于拓扑量子场论(TQFT)的物理方法，通过BRST算子的零模来描述Khovanov-Rozansky同调，为计算结多项式同调提供了更"物理"的框架。
AI.motivation: 传统同调代数方法使用复形和各种映射来描述同调，而功能积分方法通常只涉及单一类型映射的求和，这之间存在矛盾。论文旨在为Khovanov-Rozansky同调这一重要类别提供更物理的TQFT方法。
AI.method: 利用BRST算子的丰富零模集来描述复形，为所有链图（包括有开放端的缠结）构造奇微分算子。即使对于开放缠结，也发展了保持Reidemeister/拓扑不变性的因子化形式体系。
AI.result: 开发了一种比传统同调代数语言更"物理"的技术，能够处理封闭图和开放缠结的KR同调计算，为超越Chern-Simons理论的各种问题提供了应用可能。
AI.conclusion: 这种TQFT方法不仅为KR同调提供了更物理的框架，还可能提供高效算法并最终实现KR同调计算的计算机化，对封闭图和开放缠结都适用。

title: Characters of quantum loop algebras
summary: The q-characters of quantum loop algebras are very important objects in representation theory. In [20], we showed that q-characters factor as a power series of the form studied in [9] times a character, an important phenomenon which had already been known in finite types. In the present paper, we prove a conjectural formula for the aforementioned character factor.

AI.tldr: 本文证明了量子环代数q-特征中特征因子公式的猜想
AI.motivation: 量子环代数的q-特征在表示理论中非常重要，之前的研究发现q-特征可以分解为特定幂级数与特征因子的乘积，但特征因子的具体公式尚待证明
AI.method: 通过数学证明方法，验证并证明了关于特征因子的猜想公式
AI.result: 成功证明了q-特征分解中特征因子的具体公式，解决了该领域的一个猜想
AI.conclusion: 本文完成了对量子环代数q-特征分解中特征因子公式的证明，为相关表示理论研究提供了重要工具

title: Soft symmetries of topological orders
comment: 23 pages, 10 figures. added refs, added comments on open questions regarding H3 obstruction for soft symmetries
summary: (2+1)D topological orders possess emergent symmetries given by a group $\text{Aut}(\mathcal{C})$, which consists of the braided tensor autoequivalences of the modular tensor category $\mathcal{C}$ that describes the anyons. In this paper we discuss cases where $\text{Aut}(\mathcal{C})$ has elements that neither permute anyons nor are associated to any symmetry fractionalization but are still non-trivial, which we refer to as soft symmetries. We point out that one can construct topological defects corresponding to such exotic symmetry actions by decorating with a certain class of gauged SPT states that cannot be distinguished by their torus partition function. This gives a physical interpretation to work by Davydov on soft braided tensor autoequivalences. This has a number of important implications for the classification of gapped boundaries, non-invertible spontaneous symmetry breaking, and the general classification of symmetry-enriched topological phases of matter. We also demonstrate analogous phenomena in higher dimensions, such as (3+1)D gauge theory with gauge group given by the quaternion group $Q_8$.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了(2+1)维拓扑序中的软对称性，这些对称性既不置换任意子，也不与对称分数化相关，但仍然是重要的非平凡对称性。
AI.motivation: 研究拓扑序中一类特殊的对称性——软对称性，这些对称性在Aut(C)群中存在，但不涉及任意子置换或对称分数化，对理解拓扑相的分类具有重要意义。
AI.method: 通过装饰特定类型的规范对称保护拓扑态来构造对应这些奇异对称性作用的拓扑缺陷，这些SPT态无法通过其环面配分函数区分。
AI.result: 为Davydov关于软辫张量自等价的工作提供了物理解释，并揭示了软对称性对带隙边界分类、不可逆自发对称破缺以及对称富化拓扑相分类的重要影响。
AI.conclusion: 软对称性在(2+1)维拓扑序中具有重要意义，并且在更高维度（如(3+1)维四元数群Q8规范理论）中也存在类似现象，对拓扑相分类理论有深远影响。

title: On the equivalence of AQFTs and prefactorization algebras
comment: v2: 45 pages. Final version accepted for publication in Letters in Mathematical Physics
summary: This paper revisits the equivalence problem between algebraic quantum field theories and prefactorization algebras defined over globally hyperbolic Lorentzian manifolds. We develop a radically new approach whose main innovative features are 1.) a structural implementation of the additivity property used in earlier approaches and 2.) a reduction of the global equivalence problem to a family of simpler spacetime-wise problems. When applied to the case where the target category is a symmetric monoidal $1$-category, this yields a generalization of the equivalence theorem from [Commun. Math. Phys. 377, 971 (2019)]. In the case where the target is the symmetric monoidal $\infty$-category of cochain complexes, we obtain a reduction of the global $\infty$-categorical equivalence problem to simpler, but still challenging, spacetime-wise problems. The latter would be solved by showing that certain functors between $1$-categories exhibit $\infty$-localizations, however the available detection criteria are inconclusive in our case.

AI.tldr: 本文重新审视代数量子场论与定义在全局双曲洛伦兹流形上的预分解代数之间的等价性问题，提出了一种全新的方法，将全局等价问题简化为更简单的时空局部问题。
AI.motivation: 研究代数量子场论与预分解代数之间的等价关系，这是数学物理中的重要问题。先前的方法存在局限性，需要更系统化的处理框架来建立这两种数学结构之间的精确对应。
AI.method: 提出了一种全新的方法，主要创新特征包括：1）结构性地实现了早期方法中使用的可加性性质；2）将全局等价问题简化为一系列更简单的时空局部问题。当目标范畴是对称幺半1-范畴时，该方法推广了先前的结果；当目标是上链复形的对称幺半∞-范畴时，将全局∞-范畴等价问题简化为更简单但仍具挑战性的时空局部问题。
AI.result: 对于目标为对称幺半1-范畴的情况，得到了先前等价定理的推广；对于目标为上链复形的对称幺半∞-范畴的情况，成功将全局∞-范畴等价问题简化为时空局部问题，但后者仍需要进一步解决。
AI.conclusion: 本文发展了一种全新的方法来处理代数量子场论与预分解代数的等价问题，通过结构性地实现可加性性质和简化全局问题，取得了重要进展。虽然对于∞-范畴情况仍存在挑战，但为后续研究提供了新的框架和方向。

title: Non-semisimple topological field theory and $\widehat{Z}$-invariants from $\mathfrak{osp}(1 \vert 2)$
summary: We construct three-dimensional non-semisimple topological field theories from the unrolled quantum group of the Lie superalgebra $\mathfrak{osp}(1 \vert 2)$. More precisely, the quantum group depends on a root of unity $q=e^{\frac{2 π\sqrt{-1}}{r}}$, where $r$ is a positive integer greater than $2$, and the construction applies when $r$ is not congruent to $4$ modulo $8$. The algebraic result which underlies the construction is the existence of a relative modular structure on the non-finite, non-semisimple category of weight modules for the quantum group. We prove a Verlinde formula which allows for the computation of dimensions and Euler characteristics of topological field theory state spaces of unmarked surfaces. When $r$ is congruent to $\pm 1$ or $\pm 2$ modulo $8$, we relate the resulting $3$-manifold invariants with physicists' $\widehat{Z}$-invariants associated to $\mathfrak{osp}(1 \vert 2)$. Finally, we establish a relation between $\widehat{Z}$-invariants associated to $\mathfrak{sl}(2)$ and $\mathfrak{osp}(1 \vert 2)$ which was conjectured in the physics literature.

AI.tldr: 从李超代数𝔬𝔰𝔭(1|2)的展开量子群构造三维非半单拓扑场论，建立相对模结构，证明Verlinde公式，并将三维流形不变量与物理学家提出的Ẑ-不变量联系起来。
AI.motivation: 研究从李超代数𝔬𝔰𝔭(1|2)的展开量子群构造三维拓扑场论的可能性，探索非半单范畴中的相对模结构，并建立与物理学家提出的Ẑ-不变量的联系。
AI.method: 使用𝔬𝔰𝔭(1|2)的展开量子群，其中量子群依赖于单位根q=e^{2π√(-1)/r}，r>2且r不模8余4。在量子群的权模非有限非半单范畴上建立相对模结构，证明Verlinde公式用于计算未标记曲面的拓扑场论状态空间的维数和欧拉特征。
AI.result: 成功构造了三维非半单拓扑场论，建立了相对模结构，证明了Verlinde公式。当r模8余±1或±2时，将三维流形不变量与𝔬𝔰𝔭(1|2)的Ẑ-不变量联系起来。证明了物理文献中猜测的𝔰𝔩(2)和𝔬𝔰𝔭(1|2)的Ẑ-不变量之间的关系。
AI.conclusion: 从𝔬𝔰𝔭(1|2)的展开量子群成功构造了三维非半单拓扑场论，建立了与物理学家Ẑ-不变量的联系，并验证了物理文献中的猜想，为理解非半单范畴中的拓扑场论提供了新视角。
